scripts.test:rag:integration: node -e "import('./src/rag/index.js').then(m => m.ProgressiveRAGManager).then(async M => { const mgr = new M({enableTesting: true}); await mgr.initialize(); const results = await mgr.getTestRunner().runIntegrationTestsOnly(); console.log('Integration tests completed:', results); await mgr.stop(); })"
scripts.test:rag:performance: node -e "import('./src/rag/index.js').then(m => m.ProgressiveRAGManager).then(async M => { const mgr = new M({enableTesting: true}); await mgr.initialize(); const results = await mgr.getTestRunner().runPerformanceTestsOnly(); console.log('Performance tests completed:', results); await mgr.stop(); })"
scripts.optimize:rag: node -e "import('./src/rag/index.js').then(m => m.ProgressiveRAGManager).then(async M => { const mgr = new M({enableOptimization: true}); await mgr.initialize(); await mgr.start(); const results = await mgr.runOptimization(); console.log('Optimization completed:', results); await mgr.stop(); })"
